      • getGraph

        public Graph getGraph​(@Nullable
                      @Nullable java.lang.String graphIri)
               throws LpAppsException
        Get a graph resource (resource of type rgml:Graph). If there are multiple resources of this type available, return an arbitrary one. For this reason, only one graph should exist in the data set.
        Throws:
        LpAppsException
